page.title: 19LOCAL ISSUES DOGS AND LITTER
page.content: Two of the issues that cause a large amount of local feeling are the problem of dogs and litter. The problem of dogs fouling the pavements and play areas has been discussed for a number of years and the feelings are that we should not blame the dogs but their owners and that higher dog licences might be the answer to solving this issue. There is also concern on two fronts about the problem of litter.The refuse collection service has recently been privatised and there have been suggestions that the service is not good enough.There is also the comment that people of all ages do not take enough pride in their own community and that they must be made to realise that they should look after the place that they live in.
